name: omnis
short_description:
OMNIS Projects is the delivering of Open Sourçe Communitarian Game Development, Code Assets & Resources for the Delivering of Open Source Rpg Chose Your Way Games , Delivering Open, Sources &  Code Within Various Game platforms as CRYENGINE / UDK / UNITY / TORQUE / RYZOM / MYST / BIG WORLD / GAMEBRIO / PROFENIX S2 / Among others.

Within a Deep Ramification Online Open Communitarian Artistic Development Structure the OMNIS Project Promises To Revolution The Open Development On-line Universes.
summary: OMNIS - OpenSource Universal Game Production Platform
